rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/stephanie-webb/how-to-write-a-dissertation">     <title>How to write a dissertation</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/stephanie-webb/how-to-write-a-dissertation</link>     <description>Many degree courses include a final year dissertation. Stephanie Webb reveals what\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds involved and how you should approach producing one. </description>     <dc:date>2014-05-06T03:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/hannah-smithson/are-unpaid-internships-fair">     <title>Are unpaid internships fair?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/hannah-smithson/are-unpaid-internships-fair</link>     <description>Hannah Smithson asks whether unpaid internships are more about giving students skills for the future, or companies labour for free.</description>     <dc:date>2012-09-10T14:20:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/nelly-ali/making-your-personal-statement-stand-out">     <title>Making your personal statement stand university students about things to do, places to see and people to meet to make sure you get on the course you want.</description>     <dc:date>2012-08-22T09:40:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/ivonna-beches/how-do-i-discuss-my-hobbies-and-interests-in-a-job-application-or-interview">     <title>How do I discuss my hobbies and interests in a job application or interview?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/ivonna-beches/how-do-i-discuss-my-hobbies-and-interests-in-a-job-application-or-interview</link>     <description>Ivonna Beches guides you through a section of your CV or interview that\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds never as simple as it seems.</description>     <dc:date>2012-08-21T09:25:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/vicky-scott/what-to-expect-from-graduation">     <title>What to expect from graduation</title> student is working towards.</description>     <dc:date>2012-08-20T10:50:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/stephanie-webb/the-cultural-olympiad">     <title>The Cultural Olympiad</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/stephanie-webb/the-cultural-olympiad</link>     <description>Steph Webb looks beyond the athletics to the artistic side of the Olympics.</description>     <dc:date>2012-08-17T11:10:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/hannah-smithson/summer-schools-explained">     <title>Summer schools explained</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/hannah-smithson/summer-schools-explained</link>     <description>With the school holidays in full swing it might seem crazy to sign yourself up to a summer school. Hannah Smithson investigates what they are and how you can benefit from them in your spare summer days.</description>     <dc:date>2012-08-16T12:15:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/runa-rahman/the-science-behind-fasting">     <title>The science behind fasting</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/runa-rahman/the-science-behind-fasting</link>     <description>After the controversy over whether Muslim athletes should fast during the Olympics, Runa Rahman asks if there are any physical benefits to fasting.</description>     <dc:date>2012-08-15T15:35:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/clare-hyde/the-zoo-debate">     <title>The zoo debate</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/clare-hyde/the-zoo-debate</link>     <description>Clare Hyde asks whether it's ever right for zoos to keep animals in captivity.</description>     <dc:date>2012-08-14T13:55:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/mirela-inova/the-brand-bully">     <title>The brand bully</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/mirela-inova/the-brand-bully</link>     <description>You can put a price on trainers, but not on individuality, says Mirela Ivanova. </description>     <dc:date>2012-08-07T12:55:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/ivonna-beches/why-study-art">     <title>Why study art?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/ivonna-beches/why-study-art</link>     <description>Ivonna Beches interviews art student Sara Al-Salem to find out whether an art degree really is as useless as some people say.   </description>     <dc:date>2012-08-06T10:50:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/hannah-smithson/how-to-dress-for-interview-success">     <title>How to dress for interview success</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/hannah-smithson/how-to-dress-for-interview-success</link>     <description>That all important first impression is     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/clare-hyde/how-important-are-traditional-subjects</link>     <description>Clare Hyde looks at whether \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdhard\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd subjects are really worth more than \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdsoft\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd ones. </description>     <dc:date>2012-07-03T14:10:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/vicky-scott/what-is-e-learning">     <title>What is e-learning?</title> rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/stephanie-webb/top-tips-for-digital-learning">     <title>Top tips for digital learning</title> rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/hannah-smithson/should-more-students-study-abroad">     <title>Should more students study abroad?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/hannah-smithson/should-more-students-study-abroad</link>     <description>Hannah Smithson asks why more UK students don\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdt pursue education and employment abroad, and what attracts international students to the UK. </description>     <dc:date>2012-06-18T11:55:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/runa-rahman/hidden-memory">     <title>Hidden memory</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/runa-rahman/hidden-memory</link>     <description>Runa Rahman shines a light on the mystery of repressed memories. </description>     <dc:date>2012-06-14T14:10:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/nelly-ali/taster-courses-explained">     <title>Taster courses explained</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/nelly-ali/taster-courses-explained</link>     <description>Nelly Ali finds out what exactly taster courses are rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/emmeline-carr/making-the-most-out-of-school-trips">     <title>Making the most out of school trips</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/emmeline-carr/making-the-most-out-of-school-trips</link>     <description>Emmeline Carr finds the ways school trips can be more than just a break with your mates, and finds ways to afford them if money is tight at home. </description>     <dc:date>2012-06-12T13:50:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/natasha-ross/whats-going-on-in-higher-education">     <title>What's going on in higher education?</title> rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/ivonna-beches/who-is-y">     <title>Who is Y?</title> rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/vicky-scott/an-american-dream">     <title>An American dream</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/vicky-scott/an-american-dream</link>     <description>Vicky Scott speaks to two students who have broadened their rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/mirela-inova/being-bilingual">     <title>Being bilingual</title> rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/clare-hyde/kindle-vs.-books">     <title>Kindle vs. books</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/clare-hyde/kindle-vs.-books</link>     <description>Clare Hyde asks whether a Kindle is really better than a rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/runa-rahman/the-power-of-simple-words-1">     <title>The power of simple words</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/runa-rahman/the-power-of-simple-words-1</link>     <description>Runa Rahman asks whether writing sometimes becomes rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/stephanie-webb/moving-from-a-levels-to-university-3">     <title>Moving from A-levels to university</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/bright-voices/bright-voices-2012/stephanie-webb/moving-from-a-levels-to-university-3</link>     <description>Stephanie Webb interview four students about how they found doing degrees different to A-levels, what was hard, and why they all think university is better than school and college.  </description>     <dc:date>2012-05-22T23:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item> </rdf:RDF>
